DOC.brief_title: Treatment Knee Osteoarthritis : Neuromuscular Electrical Stimulation Low-level Laser .
DOC.detailed_description: - Participants randomize one three intervention group ( intervention period = 8 week 4 week control period group ) . - Electrical stimulation group ( 18-32 min pulse current , stimulation frequency 80Hz ( Hertz ) , pulse duration 200Î¼s stimulation intensity fix near maximal tolerate ) , - Laser group ( low-level laser therapy dose 4-6J ( Joules ) per point , six point knee joint ) - Combined group ( electrical stimulation low-level laser therapy ) .
